Search P2P

p2p_search.Rd

Search P2P

p2p_search(coin, fiat, side, pay_types = c(), page = NA, rows = 10)

Arguments

coin

Coin.
fiat

Fiat currency.
side

Side of the trade: "BUY" or "SELL".
pay_types

Options for payment. One or more of "BANK", "WECHAT" or "ALIPAY". The default, c(), allows all payment options.
page

Page number. If NA then get all pages.
rows

Number of records per page.

Value

A data frame.

Examples

# Grab the first page.
p2p_search("ETH", "USD", side = "BUY", page = 1)

#> # A tibble: 10 × 10
#>    advert_id  side  asset fiat  price available min_amount max_amount advertiser
#>    <chr>      <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl>     <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl> <list>    
#>  1 112943430… BUY   ETH   USD   4333.    0.0600         10      260.  <tibble […
#>  2 112647290… BUY   ETH   USD   4375     0.0224         15       98.0 <tibble […
#>  3 112859884… BUY   ETH   USD   4390     0.0854        100      375.  <tibble […
#>  4 112883126… BUY   ETH   USD   4417.    0.0262         11      110   <tibble […
#>  5 112561293… BUY   ETH   USD   4417.    0.0110         20       48.4 <tibble […
#>  6 112948694… BUY   ETH   USD   4419.    0.0783         80      346.  <tibble […
#>  7 112806491… BUY   ETH   USD   4420.    0.499          50     1500   <tibble […
#>  8 112950114… BUY   ETH   USD   4475.    1.16          500     3000   <tibble […
#>  9 112822947… BUY   ETH   USD   4486.    1.21          100     2000   <tibble […
#> 10 112940051… BUY   ETH   USD   4493.    0.199         100      896.  <tibble […
#> # … with 1 more variable: payment <list>
# Grab all pages.
p2p_search("BUSD", "CAD", side = "BUY")
